Design-01.Description: This is a solid center hood cowl stripe that can also have lettering (yellow 'TEXT OR LOGO' in image) added to it as cut out or an alternate color.

Design-02.Description: This center hood stripe has a pinstripe around the inner edge (red in image) and can be cut away, a 2nd color option, along with the optional lettering (yellow 'TEXT OR LOGO' in image). This lettering can be cut out or a another color.

Design-03.Description: This hood graphic has a thicker pinstripe around the front inside of the decal tapering off toward the rear (red in image), and can be cut out or a different color. Along with the lettering towards the nose of the car (yellow 'TEXT OR LOGO' in image). That can be a cutout or also another color.

Design-04.Description: This center hood stripe has tiered pinstripes (red in image) that can either be cutout or a 2nd color.

Design-05.Description: This center hood decal is a chevroned strobe one color design.

Design-06.Description: This center hood stripe is a full strobe one color design. The "strobe" stripes vary from thick at the front to thin at the rear.
